duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the coverage and damage analysis of property claims from start to finish, supporting customer needs and ensuring swift resolution.
Use strong negotiation and customer service skills to interact with customers, insurance carriers, and others.
Inspect, photograph, measure, sketch, and assess damages to homes involved in losses such as fire, water damage, wind damage, flood damage, hail, and vandalism.
Determine the extent of the property loss, estimating the cost to repair, replace, or compensate.
Identify additional exposures such as Personal Property/Contents, Additional Living Expense, Mold, and Ordinance related to a property loss.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or higher and related work experience in commercial, property, or specialty lines claims handling.
